definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: South Korea, in particular, dreads the cost of rebuilding the North.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是韓國，對於重建北方的花銷心存畏懼。

sentences.english: A few dinners out do add up quickly.
sentences.chinese: 去外面喫幾頓飯後的花銷加在一起就很厲害了。

sentences.english: People go to the house empty, clear shadow alongside spending thin.
sentences.chinese: 人去小樓空，清影傍花銷瘦。

sentences.english: But one of the key variables is government spending.
sentences.chinese: 但是一個關鍵的變量是政府花銷。

sentences.english: Wei Xu believes that it would hurt his pride to ask a girl to share the cost.
sentences.chinese: 魏敘認爲請求女孩分擔花銷是傷自尊的事。

sentences.english: I think all holidays have kinda gone overboard, and Halloween is one of them.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲所有的節日都花銷不菲，萬聖節只是其中之一。

sentences.english: It's a lot more than $18 billion in pork-barrel spending.
sentences.chinese: 它遠比180億美元的建設經費花銷多。

sentences.english: Now I need a thousand to cover all the expenses.
sentences.chinese: 現在我需要一千美元，才能涵蓋所有花銷。

sentences.english: If your expenses exceed your income, you'll need to cut back on nonessential items.
sentences.chinese: 如果花銷超過月收入，你需要減少非必需品的開銷。

sentences.english: Again, spending less or earning more money is the proper solution.
sentences.chinese: 再說，花銷少或多掙錢是適當的解決方法。

sentences.english: I congratulate you. You have there a rent of nine thousand francs per annum.
sentences.chinese: 您在這上面每年就得花銷九千法郎。

sentences.english: I grudingly agree with developers who say that its not worth the effort.
sentences.chinese: 我同意那些開發人員所說的，這些花銷可能不值得。

sentences.english: The company also pays him for use of the plane, which came in at over $700, 000 in 2007 alone.
sentences.chinese: 公司還報銷飛機的花銷，70萬單2007年。

sentences.english: All I can do is predict you're going to spend it really wisely.
sentences.chinese: 我能夠做的只是預言您的花銷將是非常精打細算的。

sentences.english: The cost of children's education eats up a third of a Chinese family's total income.
sentences.chinese: 中國家庭的子女教育花銷佔家庭總收入的三分之一。

sentences.english: Such state spending also drove more strength-building exercise for boys and girls.
sentences.chinese: 此政府花銷同時也爲男生女生帶來更多的塑形鍛鍊。
